Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::ForwardGeometryChoreonoid< T >

Compute forward geometry for a particular robot model.

Robot model from choreonoid should be passed to the constructor and use for computation. The analytical jacobian must also be retrieved and returned in the impl_gradient/impl_jacobian methods.
